text: Kelly Deane Melissa Rutherford (born November 6, 1968 in Elizabethtown, Kentucky, U.S.) is an American actress. == Personal life == Kelly was married to Carlos Tarajano from 2001 to 2002. From 2006 to 2010 she was married to Daniel Giersch. They have two children together — a son Hermés Gustaf Daniel Giersch (b.October 18, 2006) and a daughter Helena Grace Rutherford-Giersch (b.June 8, 2009). Currently she lives in Manhattan (New York, U.S.) with her children. == Other websites == * Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Kentucky
title: Kelly Rutherford
